name: LUCY-HARUN
description: Discord bot which displays CoinGecko crypto prices.

COIN_ID.description: ID of the token. probably ethereum

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: API token of the Discord bot.

UPDATE_FREQUENCY.description: How often should the price be refreshed in seconds.

NAME.description: Name of the token/asset which will be shown before the price.

CHAIN.description: Chain of the token. probably ethereum

REFRESH_TIMER.description: How often should the price be refreshed in seconds.
